quotes.author: Chris Pine
quotes.text: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie
quotes.text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.

quotes.author: John Lennon
quotes.text: Yeah We alll shine on, Like the Moon, and the Stars, And the SUN.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
quotes.text: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.text: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.

quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
quotes.text: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
